import React, { Component } from 'react'; import axios from 'axios'; import "../CSS/profile.css"; // import Link from 'Link'; class profile extends Component { constructor(props){ super(props); this.state = { profile:{}, userid:"" }; } componentDidMount(){ const id = this.props.match.params.id; this.state.userid = id; axios.get(`http://localhost:8015/profile/${id}`).then((res) => { if(res.data.success) { this.setState({ profile:res.data.profile }); console.log(this.state.profile); } }); } render() { const {fName,lName,uName,email,password} = this.state.profile; return (
